name: 柯俊宏
objective:
本課程旨在教授醫學工程的基本概念，特別著重於雷射醫學的應用與發展。學生將學習相關理論、技術及臨床應用，為未來在生物醫學與醫療科技領域的研究與實踐奠定基礎。

This course aims to introduce the fundamental concepts of biomedical engineering, with a focus on laser medicine applications and advancements. Students will gain theoretical knowledge, technical skills, and insights into clinical applications, laying the groundwork for research and practice in biomedical and medical technology fields.
schedule:
Week 1 (2/20/2024):
解剖學及生理學 (Anatomy and Physiology):
介紹人體結構與功能，為生醫工程的應用提供基礎知識。
Overview of human anatomy and physiology as foundational knowledge for biomedical applications.

Week 2 (2/27/2024):
生物力學 (Biomechanics):
探討人體運動與機械力之間的關係及其在醫學中的應用。
Study of the relationship between human motion and mechanical forces in medical applications.

Week 3 (3/6/2024):
復建工程及輔具科技 (Rehabilitation Engineering and Assistive Technology):
設計及應用輔助裝置以提升患者生活品質。
Design and application of assistive devices to enhance patient quality of life.

Week 4 (3/13/2024):
生醫材料 (Biomaterials):
分析各種生醫材料的特性及其在醫療設備和植入物中的應用。
Examination of properties of biomaterials and their applications in medical devices and implants.

Week 5 (3/20/2024):
生醫光學基本原理及其在診斷與治療中的應用 (Biomedical Optics – Principles and Applications):
探討光學技術在診斷與治療中的應用，包括光譜、光學成像及光子技術。
Study of optical technologies in diagnostics and treatment, including spectroscopy, optical imaging, and photonics.

Week 6 (3/27/2024):
雷射技術在醫學中的發展 (Laser Technology in Medicine):
雷射技術在牙科、皮膚科及手術中的診斷與治療應用。
Advancements of laser technology in diagnostics and therapy, focusing on applications in dentistry, dermatology, and surgical procedures.

name: 莊賀喬
